description: https://github.com/mnellemann/hmci/ - Metrics from IBM Power Systems

options.content:
## Metrics collected from IBM Power HMC
    
For more information visit: [github.com/mnellemann/hmci](https://github.com/mnellemann/hmci)

targets.query: SELECT last("weight") AS "Weight", last("mode") AS "Mode", last("entitled_units") AS "eCPU",  mean("utilized_units") / mean("entitled_units")*100 AS "Utilization eCPU", last("vp_units") AS "vCPU", mean("utilized_units") / mean("vp_units") * 100 AS "Utilization vCPU"  FROM "partition_processor" WHERE ("system" =~ /^$system$/) AND ("partition" =~ /^$partition/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY "partition" fill(previous)

SELECT last("id") AS "ID", last("state") as "State", last("type") as "OS Type", last("affinity_ratio") as "Affinity Score" FROM "partition_info" WHERE ("partition" =~ /^$partition$/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY "partition"  fill(previous)

SELECT mean("utilized_units") AS "usage" FROM "partition_processor" WHERE ("partition" =~ /^$partition$/ AND "system" =~ /^$system$/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval), "partition", "system" fill(linear)

SELECT (mean("utilized_units") / mean("entitled_units")) * 100 AS "usage" FROM "partition_processor" WHERE ("system" =~ /^$system$/ AND "partition" =~ /^$partition$/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval), "partition", "system" fill(linear)

SELECT mean("value") FROM "PartitionVirtualFiberChannelAdapters" WHERE ("system" =~ /^$ManagedSystem$/ AND "name" != 'transmittedBytes' AND "partition" =~ /^$Partition$/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval), "wwpn", "partition", "name" fill(null)

panels.title: Virtual Fiber Channel Adapters - Read Bytes

targets.query: SELECT mean("value") FROM "PartitionVirtualFiberChannelAdapters" WHERE ("system" =~ /^$ManagedSystem$/ AND "name" != 'transmittedBytes' AND "partition" =~ /^$Partition$/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval), "wwpn", "partition", "name" fill(null)

panels.title: Virtual Fiber Channel Adapters - Write Bytes

list.definition: SHOW TAG VALUES FROM "system_processor" WITH KEY = "system" WHERE time > now() - 24h
list.label: System Name
list.name: system

query.query: SHOW TAG VALUES FROM "system_processor" WITH KEY = "system" WHERE time > now() - 24h

list.definition: SHOW TAG VALUES FROM "partition_processor" WITH KEY = "partition" WHERE system =~ /$system/
list.label: Partition Name
list.name: partition

query.query: SHOW TAG VALUES FROM "partition_processor" WITH KEY = "partition" WHERE system =~ /$system/

title: HMCi - Power Partition Overview - InfluxDB
